architectural_notes: Admin authentication uses Internet Identity principal IDs
Admin principal IDs are stored in backend and validated on each admin panel access
System supports multiple admin accounts via principal ID whitelist
known_issues: User lost original admin Internet Identity anchor number, requiring backend admin principal update
Admin panel shows 'Admin: No' when current principal is not in admin whitelist
Internet Identity passkey recovery not available without anchor number or recovery phrase

new_feature_requests.summary: Add the principal ID 'p-3sib2-hfxnj-zit4w-kqyca-3r66g' to the backend admin whitelist so this user has admin access
Redeploy the existing draft application with the updated admin configuration
